title: Robot Commission Request
description: Request for changing the allowed robot commissioning behavior

reassign_dispatched_tasks.description: Reassigns tasks already dispatched to this robot to other robots if turning off dispatch_tasks was requested

cancel_direct_tasks.description: Cancels tasks already directly dispatched to this robot if turning off direct_tasks was requested

cancel_idle_tasks.description: Cancels idle tasks that the robot is already performing if turning off idle_tasks was requested
